actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The burrowling makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Burrow Awareness
special_abilities.desc: A burrowling has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks if at least one other burrowling within 10 feet of it isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The burrowling has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the burrowling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
